text: Alice Maud Krige (; born 28 June 1954) is a South African actress and producer. She is best known for her role in Chariots of Fire (1981) as the Gilbert and Sullivan singer Sybil Gordon. She played the dual role of Eva Galli/Alma Mobley in Ghost Story, and the Borg Queen in the Star Trek franchise. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:South African actors Category:Movie producers
title: Alice Krige
